thread.title: Sweet! CBS Orders a Full Season of Limitless
thread.title_full: Sweet! CBS Orders a Full Season of Limitless - seattlepi.com

author: Shelli Weinstein, TV GUIDE
title: Sweet! CBS Orders a Full Season of Limitless
text:
Limitless is on its way to being just that! CBS has given the drama a full season of 22-episodes, Variety reports.
"We're excited how Limitless continues to evolve creatively each week and stand out with its unique style of storyelling," Glenn Geller , president of CBS Entertainment said in a statement. "It's off to a strong start in a highly competitive environment."
Limitless stars Jake McDorman as Brian Finch , who takes the brain-enhancing drug NZT to reach his full potential and becomes a consultant for the FBI. The drama has averaged a 1.7 rating among adults 18-49 and 9 million total viewers per episode over the five weeks since its premiere.

The network also ordered additional scripts for its medical drama Code Black , starring Marcia Gay Harden .
Limitless is the fifth new series to grab a full-season order after NBC's Blindspot , ABC's Quantico and Dr. Ken and Fox's Rosewood were told the good news.
Limitless airs Tuesdays at 10/9c on CBS. Are you happy to have more?
(Full disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS)
 Limitless Jake McDorman Jennifer Carpenter
